Question: Which of the following statements describes the best strategy to address class imbalance?
Answer: If there is a lot of data just use under-sampling otherwise use outlier detection algorithms.
Determine the best variant of SMOTE by comparisons and use it.
Continue to collect data until you have balanced classes.
Use an outlier detection algorithm or SVM instead of a re-sampling technique.
Compare re-sampling approaches to a baseline and to detection algorithms.
Correct: Compare re-sampling approaches to a baseline and to detection algorithms.

Question: Which statement best describes why visualization of topics can have an impact on the business opportunity?
Answer: Because sharing with domain experts might enable topic-specific feature engineering
Because visual inspection can help choose the number of topics
Because we are able to see the top words with each topic

Correct: Because sharing with domain experts might enable topic-specific feature engineering
